div.p: PRIVILEGE, THE REPORT SAYS THE KENNEDY SCHOOL AT

BUT THERE IS SOMETHING GOING ON UP THERE.
TO SOME THE WORDS WHITE PRIVILEGE ARE CODE.
THEY REALLY MEAN WHITE SUPREMACY.
